## Sprint 3: V1 Staff Directory - Teams & Presence

**Duration**: 1.5 weeks  
**Priority**: High  
**Goal**: Complete staff directory with Graph API integration

### Tasks

- [ ] **Staff Directory Page**
  - [ ] Search functionality
  - [ ] Filter by faculty/role
  - [ ] Display staff cards with photos
  - [ ] Show presence status
  - [ ] Display Teams membership

- [ ] **Graph API Integration**
  - [ ] Fetch staff photos
  - [ ] Get presence status
  - [ ] List Teams memberships
  - [ ] Calculate next available time
  - [ ] Cache Graph data appropriately

- [ ] **Staff Profile View**
  - [ ] Detailed staff profile page
  - [ ] Full timetable view
  - [ ] Teams channels list
  - [ ] Calendar availability
  - [ ] Contact information

- [ ] **Teams Integration**
  - [ ] "Chat in Teams" button
  - [ ] Direct Teams channel links
  - [ ] Teams membership display
  - [ ] Faculty team links

- [ ] **Search & Filter**
  - [ ] Real-time search
  - [ ] Faculty filter
  - [ ] Role filter
  - [ ] Presence filter (optional)

### Acceptance Criteria

- ✅ Staff directory search works instantly
- ✅ Photos load from Graph API
- ✅ Presence status updates correctly
- ✅ Teams chat links work
- ✅ Filtering works smoothly
- ✅ Mobile-responsive design

### Dependencies

- Sprint 1 complete (Graph SDK ready)
- Graph API permissions granted

### Notes

This completes the staff directory feature that teachers use frequently to find colleagues.
